trans-unit.source: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [\<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) element (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) derive.
trans-unit.target: A classe base dos quais os módulos HTTP que são configuráveis com a [ \<system.identityModel.services\>](../Topic/%3Csystem.identityModel.services%3E.md) elemento (<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref>) derivar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos (exceto memória) utilizados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Override this method in your derived class to release resources.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método na classe derivada para libertar recursos.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> objeto que está em vigor para o módulo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> objeto que está em vigor para o módulo atual.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa para definir a propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o módulo HTTP.

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método implementa o <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método ao inicializar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>propriedade para o valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, invocar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>método e, em seguida, invocar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Substituição de classes derivadas do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>métodos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de aplicação que contém este módulo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, inicializa o módulo atual e prepara-o para processar eventos a partir do respetivo objeto de aplicação do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Use the InitializeModule method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de InitializeModule carregar qualquer Estado de configuração adicionais, bem como para registar métodos de processamento de eventos específicos eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>objeto.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>método, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>a propriedade já foi inicializada.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter o objeto de configuração que está em vigor para este módulo desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>propriedade deve ser utilizada para todo o processamento de token neste módulo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de aplicação que contém este módulo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> object that is in effect for it.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, inicializa com base nos valores de propriedades de módulo de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"> </xref> objeto que está em vigor para o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>método, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A>a propriedade já foi inicializada.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter o objeto de configuração que está em vigor para este módulo desta propriedade.
